headline: Modelo Brewer Constellation Brands Awaits Fateful Decision on Tariffs
summary: Few major U.S. corporations would be as clearly affected by tariffs on Mexico as  Constellation Brands  which sells the imported Modelo, Corona and Pacifico beer brands in the U.S.  It is tempting to think then that the stock could be in for quite a bounce if President-elect  Donald Trump  doesn’t ultimately make good on his threat of 25% tariffs for Mexico and Canada.  After all, the Mexican brands that make up Constellation’s beer business accounted for 82% of the company’s net sales in its fiscal year ended in February 2024.
